title: If this guy gets to play I just don't even know anymore...

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
how can this guy get away with this for so long? hes in my friends game right now saying stuff like "yeah im going down mid and feeding" etc.

check out his match history.

replies.body: OMFG!! That is an insane list of games, but naming and shaming people isn't a stance that riot takes with these kinds of matters. But I'm surprised that he isn't getting pulled up for intentional feeding. I think most of the community is a little disheartened by our lack of Tribunal that he may not be getting reported. Hope your friends game doesn't end in a loss...

> [{quoted}](name=Phantasies,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hr6FuB0F,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-04T06:00:06.221+0000)
>
> OMFG!! That is an insane list of games, but naming and shaming people isn't a stance that riot takes with these kinds of matters. But I'm surprised that he isn't getting pulled up for intentional feeding. I think most of the community is a little disheartened by our lack of Tribunal that he may not be getting reported. Hope your friends game doesn't end in a loss...

yeah it did lol im suprised that he hasn't been banned yet..
hes an idiot and yup still no action from riot

> [{quoted}](name=Mellowhype,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hr6FuB0F,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-06T03:11:44.434+0000)
>
> hes an idiot and yup still no action from riot

He is definitely a feeder. 2/27 on Darius. Come on, how can anyone feed so much. Even half brain dead with randomly pressing q,w,e,r cannot die 27 times.

> [{quoted}](name=LCS,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hr6FuB0F,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-04T05:14:44.469+0000)
>
> how can this guy get away with this for so long? hes in my friends game right now saying stuff like "yeah im going down mid and feeding" etc.
> 
> check out his match history.


> [{quoted}](name=LCS,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=hr6FuB0F,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-04T05:14:44.469+0000)
>
> how can this guy get away with this for so long? hes in my friends game right now saying stuff like "yeah im going down mid and feeding" etc.
> 
> check out his match history.

KNOCK KNOCK KNOCKING ON HEAVENS DOOR.  :) :) :D
bump, i know naming and shaming shouldn't be done but when you have idiots like this, everyone deserves to know his name.
